name: Cosmic Assault: Endless Space Shooter (GoEd)
description:
This is my first ever completed project it's not the best but I am trying.

Cosmic Assault is an endless space shooter game where you face off against enemy spaceships, dodging their attacks while shooting them down to earn points. With two different enemy types and power-ups like health boosts and double laser boosts, each wave of enemies will bring new challenges. As you progress, the enemies will get stronger. With the promise of even more enemy types and power-ups to come, Cosmic Assault is an endless adventure that you won't want to miss. So strap in, blast off, and get ready for a cosmic battle unlike any other.
